name: A garbage
description:
A  garbage is a 2D piece of junk  including ships and more garbage. 

Its supposed to play like a turn-based RPG strategy game.

Theres 2 levels to teach you the basics, after that theres an endless mode to not enjoy.

(found out about a soft lock on endless mode after submitting, whoops!)

Contact me on discord: Massif man#3965
